front.title: IPv6 Option for DetNet Data Fields

abstract.t: The enhanced Deterministic Networking (DetNet) is required to provide packet treatment for data plane to achieve the DetNet QoS such as deterministic latency. New functions and related metadata should be supported and DetNet data fields and option types such as Deterministic Latency Action (DLA) option should be carried in enhanced DetNet. This document defines how DetNet data fields are encapsulated in IPv6 option.
